mapper.select: SELECT /* CartWriterMapper.selectCartList */ spbk_id, spbk_dvsn_code, spbk_kind_code, unfy_cmdt_id, unt_itm_srmb, memno, tmpr_mmbr_num, requ_qntt, end_dttm, mmbr_ys, frbe_ys, orgl_unfy_cmdt_id, cycl_code, dlvr_dw_code, ttl_dlvr_nmtm, cnrc_nmtm, brdr_bran_code, link_dvsn_code, jo_code, sctn_code, chek_ys, addt_ordr_cntt, prin_cntt, crtr_id, cret_dttm, amnr_id, amnd_dttm FROM dev.tm_spbk LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0
